sections.title: Service concession arrangements
sections.description: Checklist for presentation and disclosure requirements under IFRIC 12.

items.question: Does the entity disclose a description of each service concession arrangement (or, in aggregate, each class of arrangements)?

Does the entity disclose a description of the significant terms of each arrangement that may affect the amount, timing and uncertainty of future cash flows (for example, the period of the concession, the date of the next renegotiation, and whether payments are variable or fixed)?
Does the entity disclose its obligations to acquire or build items of property, plant and equipment under each arrangement?
Does the entity disclose its obligations to deliver, or its rights to receive, specified assets at the end of the concession period?
Does the entity disclose renewal and termination options embedded in each arrangement?
Does the entity disclose any other rights and obligations arising from each arrangement?
Does the entity disclose any changes in each arrangement that occurred during the reporting period?
Does the entity disclose how each service concession arrangement is classified (e.g., as a financial asset or an intangible asset)?
Does the entity disclose the revenue and profit or loss recognised in the reporting period on exchanging construction or upgrade services for a financial asset or an intangible asset?
